Throughout Pride, we should reflect on history and progress, and also recommit to protecting and fighting for equality moving forward. LGBTQ activism and community-building continues today, and Arizona is home to incredible groups leading this cause and making a difference.

Today kicks off #PrideMonth, a celebration of everyone in the LGBTQ community. This month also honors the 50th anniversary of the Stonewall Riots, civil rights and community leaders fought back against LGBTQ harassment from the police in Greenwich Village in June 1969.
